name: blurred
content:

(also blurry, uk
Your browser doesn't support HTML5 audio
/ˈblɜː.ri/ us
Your browser doesn't support HTML5 audio
/ˈblɝː.i/) difficult to see: The photograph was very blurred. The picture on the TV went all blurry.
difficult to understand or separate clearly: Do you agree that male and female roles are becoming blurred?
unable to see clearly: My eyes were blurred with tears.
